description:
Customization App for Logitech Devices

Enhance your Logitech devices with Logi Options Plus software. Customize settings, create shortcuts, and increase productivity.
New features
- [China region only] Introducing: Logi AI Portal. Seamlessly access popular AI tools. (Only available on Windows, macOS support coming soon.)
- Smart Actions - Introducing enhanced organization of Smart Actions through our new Labels feature. Utilize labels to more effectively group your smart actions. Simply tag your Smart Actions with new labels for better grouping and filtering.
- [Non-China region only] AI Prompt Builder - Customize with ease: rearrange your recipes by simply dragging and dropping them into your preferred order.

What's fixed
- Fixes for some random crashes.
